title: Oracle DB database
description: Designed with a patented new architecture to handle all aspects of data and analytics

dsn.title: DSN
dsn.description: Specify the desired network or the TNS names

wallet_file.title: Oracle Wallet File
wallet_file.description: Upload a ZIP file containing your complete Oracle wallet. The wallet should include ewallet.pem, tnsnames.ora, sqlnet.ora, and any other Oracle configuration files.

wallet_password.title: Wallet Password
wallet_password.description: Specifies the password for the PEM file
